comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Caption should be corrected to reflect that this is a Convair F-106B Delta Dart (USAF Ser. No. 57-2516, c/n 39). This particular aircraft would go on to have an active flight test career for NASA (as N616NA, and later, N816NA), including being purposefully flown into thunderstorms and struck by lightning hundreds of times. Today, it is on exhibit at the Virginia Air & Space Center (VASC) in Hampton, Virginia. See: www.f-106deltadart.com/lineage/572516Page.html
